mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg) values (tbl_goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes}, #{gdsImg}, #{gdsThumbImg})
mapper.select: select gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate from tbl_goods order by gdsNum desc

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_goods set gdsName = #{gdsName}, cateCode = #{cateCode}, gdsPrice = #{gdsPrice}, gdsStock = #{gdsStock}, gdsDes = #{gdsDes} where gdsNum = ${gdsNum}
mapper.insert: insert into parking (GP_id, userId, GP_name, GP_lat, GP_long, GP_Runtime, GP_content, GP_restday , GP_image1, GP_image2, GP_image3, GP_image4, GP_slot, GP_basetime, GP_basepay, GP_overtime, GP_overpay, GP_onepay, GP_monthpay, GP_ThumbImg1,GP_ThumbImg2,GP_ThumbImg3,GP_ThumbImg4) values (PARKING_SEQ.nextval, #{userId}, #{GP_name}, #{GP_lat}, #{GP_long}, #{GP_Runtime}, #{GP_content}, #{GP_restday}, #{GP_image1}, #{GP_image2}, #{GP_image3}, #{GP_image4}, #{GP_slot}, #{GP_basetime}, #{GP_basepay}, #{GP_overtime}, #{GP_overpay}, #{GP_onepay}, #{GP_monthpay}, #{GP_ThumbImg1}, #{GP_ThumbImg2}, #{GP_ThumbImg3}, #{GP_ThumbImg4})
mapper.select: select g.GP_id, g.userId, m.username, g.GP_name, GP_lat, GP_long, GP_Runtime, GP_content, GP_restday, GP_image1, GP_image2, GP_image3, GP_image4, GP_slot, GP_basetime, GP_basepay, GP_overtime, GP_overpay, GP_onepay, GP_monthpay, GP_ThumbImg1,GP_ThumbImg2,GP_ThumbImg3,GP_ThumbImg4 from parking g, tbl_member m where g.userId = m.userId order by TO_NUMBER(GP_id) DESC

select g.GP_id, g.userId, g.GP_name, g.GP_lat, g.GP_long, g.GP_Runtime, g.GP_content, g.GP_restday, g.GP_image1, g.GP_image2, g.GP_image3, g.GP_image4, g.GP_slot, g.GP_basetime, g.GP_basepay, g.GP_overtime, g.GP_overpay, g.GP_onepay, g.GP_monthpay from parking g where g.GP_id = #{GP_id}
mapper.insert: insert into GoodPlace (GP_id, userId, GP_content, GP_REF_ID) values (GoodPlace_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{GP_content}, #{GP_REF_ID})
mapper.select: select g.GP_id, m.username, g.GP_content, g.GP_date from GoodPlace g, tbl_member m where GP_REF_ID = #{GP_id} and g.userId = m.userId
mapper.delete: delete from GoodPlace where GP_id = #{GP_id} or GP_REF_ID = #{GP_id}
